room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Escape Room Center in Bridgewater
review: Blackbeard’s Brig with a group of 6 and it was a blast! The room is nicely designed and we had a great time. Liz was quick with the help when we needed it and helped make the game fun. We have been to this center two times prior and really enjoy it every time.

room_title: Escape room "Blackbeard's Brig" by Escape Room Center in Bridgewater
review: We celebrated my daughters 13th birthday here. The escape room (Blackbeard’s Brig) was fun for all and our guide, Ray, was attentive and super nice to work with. The kitchen/party room was perfect for our group, too!
